issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Tapping on the SOAP table row does not do anything.

Not a Regression, occurs with 2.0.2GA

Steps to reproduce:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.(safari for iphone & IE for windows phone). 
3.Hit go or enter.
4.Kitchen sink will fire up in the browser.
5.Tap on mashups tab.
6.Tap on the SOAP table row.
7.You will see that nothing happens

Actual result:
1.Nothing happens on tapping the SOAP table row.

Expected result:
1.We should get euro Buys you <$> U.S dollars should be displayed & should look for any Error messages in the log.
fields.summary: Mobile Web:Mashups-->SOAP : Tapping on the SOAP table row does not do anything.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 2.1.0.201206071457
SDK Version : 2.1.0.v20120608070223
Iphone 4.3.5
windows phone mango

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
